scene_description_enriched: A haloed male figure, likely a saint or evangelist, is depicted writing in a book. He has long brown hair, a beard, and is wearing a pink tunic and a blue mantle. He holds a quill pen in his right hand, poised over an open book with illuminated pages. The book rests on a stand. The background is a dark blue, suggesting an indoor or possibly metaphysical setting, framed by an arched architectural element with gold detailing.
